subject: Re: [junit] Testing with a ResultSet
msgSnippet: Besides Mock Object, I would strongly suggest EasyMock http://tammofreese.de/easymock/index.html I have been using it since I found it, it is great for
messageBody:
Besides Mock Object, I would strongly suggest EasyMock
http://tammofreese.de/easymock/index.html

I have been using it since I found it, it is great for creating a mock
for interfaces.

Heath, Joseph wrote:

>What about creating a MockResultSet that implements the ResultSet interface
>that has the behaviour you require. You only need to write the class to give
>the appearance of a 'real' ResultSet rather thatn the functionality.
>joe
>
